donations.title: Elderly Iftar Table
donations.description: A charitable iftar table dedicated to the elderly, providing nutritious and easy-to-digest meals in a warm atmosphere.

donations.title: Orphan Iftar Gathering
donations.description: A Ramadan iftar held at orphanages to create a family-like atmosphere filled with joy for orphaned children.

donations.title: Charity Iftar for Needy Families
donations.description: Complete Ramadan meals provided to needy families to ease financial burdens during the holy month.

donations.title: Mosque Iftar Table
donations.description: Ramadan meals served in mosques for fasting individuals, offering a variety of light and nutritious dishes.

donations.title: Community Neighbors' Iftar
donations.description: A communal iftar gathering that brings neighbors together, strengthening social ties during Ramadan.

donations.title: Laborers' Iftar
donations.description: A special iftar for workers in physically demanding jobs, featuring nutritious meals to restore their energy.

donations.title: Refugee Iftar Table
donations.description: Hot meals distributed in refugee camps to ensure a fulfilling iftar for displaced families.

donations.title: Travelers' Iftar
donations.description: Meals distributed on roads for travelers and commuters breaking their fast while on the move.

donations.title: Hospital Iftar Table
donations.description: Ramadan meals served to patients and healthcare workers during iftar time.

donations.title: Boarding School Iftar
donations.description: An iftar gathering for students in boarding schools to create a warm Ramadan experience.

donations.title: Sanitation Workers' Iftar
donations.description: Meals provided for sanitation workers as a token of appreciation for their hard work in keeping cities clean.

donations.title: Prison Iftar Table
donations.description: A charity iftar inside prisons to bring joy and spiritual connection to inmates during Ramadan.

donations.title: Unemployed Individuals' Iftar
donations.description: Charitable iftar tables for those who have lost their jobs and face financial hardships.

donations.title: Volunteers' Iftar
donations.description: A community iftar event honoring individuals who dedicate their time to volunteer work during Ramadan.

donations.title: Cancer Patients' Iftar
donations.description: A charitable iftar organized for children battling cancer to bring them joy and comfort.
